message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you at a price of $20,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.  What do you think?
Alice,  $20,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $15,000 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Bob, I understand your position, but $20,000 is a fair starting point considering the value this product offers. How about we meet in the middle at $17,500?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $17,500 is still a bit high for me.  I'm happy to meet you halfway at $16,250. This seems like a fair compromise.
